welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ginowan, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ginowan has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kadena AB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kadena AB Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naha Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Naha Airport is used for flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Naha Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kerama Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Kerama Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
